DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate effect Manual Lymphatic Drainage ( MLD ) massage arterial venous circulation upper limb ipsilateral woman submit axillary lymphadenectomy breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Manual Lymphatic Drainage Superior Member Women Post-surgery Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study evaluate effect Manual Lymphatic Drainage ( MLD ) massage arterial venous circulation upper limb ipsilateral woman submit axillary lymphadenectomy breast cancer . Will evaluate 30 volunteer age 40 60 year , divide 2 equal group , submit MLD : Group 1 - volunteer underwent surgery breast cancer lymphedema , subject manual lymphatic drainage without upper limb elevation ; Group 2 - volunteer underwent surgery breast cancer lymphedema , subject manual lymphatic drainage upper limb elevation 30º . Data collect ultrasound Doppler vein brachial artery , MLD , immediately , 30 minute therapeutic treatment , without elevation 30° , cross delimitation , make therapy session therapeutic use without elevation , interval period ( washout ) seven day . The order treatment protocol randomize simple raffle volunteer . The data within group evaluate statistical test student ANOVA . Otherwise use Kruskal-Wallis follow test Dunn . Data processing perform software fix critical level 5 % ( p < 0,05 ) .
DOC.criteria: Women axillary lymphadenectomy surgery Lymphedema Aged 4060 year . Women muscletendon injury / joint injury member Skin disorder circulatory disease .
